spells.name: Dimensional Anchor
spells.description: Bars extradimensional movement.

spells.name: Fire Trap
spells.description: Opened object deals 1d4 damage + 1/level.

spells.name: Globe of Invulnerability, Lesser
spells.description: Stops 1st- through 3rd-level spell effects.

spells.name: Remove Curse
spells.description: Frees object or person from curse.

spells.name: Stoneskin
spells.description: Grants DR 10/adamantine.

spells.name: Black Tentacles
spells.description: Tentacles grapple all creatures within a 20-ft. spread.

spells.name: Dimension Door
spells.description: Teleports you a short distance.

spells.name: Minor Creation
spells.description: Creates one cloth or wood object.

spells.name: Secure Shelter
spells.description: Creates sturdy cottage.

spells.name: Solid Fog
spells.description: Blocks vision and slows movement.

spells.name: Summon Monster IV
spells.description: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

spells.name: Arcane Eye
spells.description: Invisible floating eye moves 30 ft./round.

spells.name: Detect Scrying
spells.description: Alerts you to magical eavesdropping

spells.name: Locate Creature
spells.description: Indicates direction to familiar creature.

spells.name: Scrying
spells.description: Spies on subject from a distance.

spells.name: Charm Monster
spells.description: Makes monster believe it is your ally.

spells.name: Confusion
spells.description: Subjects behave oddly for 1 round/level.

spells.name: Crushing Despair
spells.description: Subjects take -2 on attack rolls, damage rolls, saves, and checks.

spells.name: Geas, Lesser
spells.description: Commands subject of 7 HD or less.

spells.name: Fire Shield
spells.description: Creatures attacking you take fire damage; you're protected from heat or cold.

spells.name: Ice Storm
spells.description: Hail deals 5d6 damage in cylinder 40 ft. across.

spells.name: Resilient Sphere
spells.description: Force globe protects but traps one subject.

spells.name: Shout
spells.description: Deafens all within cone and deals 5d6 sonic damage.

spells.name: Wall of Fire
spells.description: Deals 2d4 fire damage out to 10 ft. and 1d4 out to 20 ft. Passing through wall deals 2d6 damage + 1/level.

spells.name: Wall of Ice
spells.description: Ice plane creates wall or hemisphere creates dome.

spells.name: Hallucinatory Terrain
spells.description: Makes one type of terrain appear like another (field as forest, or the like).

spells.name: Illusory Wall
spells.description: Wall, floor, or ceiling looks real, but anything can pass through.

spells.name: Invisibility, Greater
spells.description: As invisibility, but subject can attack and stay invisible.

spells.name: Phantasmal Killer
spells.description: Fearsome illusion kills subject or deals 3d6 damage.

spells.name: Rainbow Pattern
spells.description: Lights fascinate 24 HD of creatures.

spells.name: Shadow Conjuration
spells.description: Mimics conjuration below 4th level, but only 20% real.

spells.name: Animate Dead
spells.description: Creates undead skeletons and zombies out of corpses.

spells.name: Bestow Curse
spells.description: -6 to an ability score; -4 on attack rolls, saves, and checks; or 50% chance of losing each action.

spells.name: Contagion
spells.description: Infects subject with chosen disease.

spells.name: Enervation
spells.description: Subject gains 1d4 negative levels.

spells.name: Fear
spells.description: Subjects within cone flee for 1 round/level.

spells.name: Beast Shape II
spells.description: You take the form and some of the powers of a Tiny or Large animal.

spells.name: Elemental Body I
spells.description: Turns you into a Small elemental.

spells.name: Enlarge Person, Mass
spells.description: 1 humanoid creature/level doubles in size.

spells.name: Mnemonic Enhancer
spells.description: Wizard only. Prepare extra spells or retain one just cast.

spells.name: Reduce Person, Mass
spells.description: As reduce person, but affects 1 humanoid creature/level.

spells.name: Stone Shape
spells.description: Sculpts stone into any shape.
